EmailTemplate.name: WeLive Tour Reminder (Morning - Day of Tour)
EmailTemplate.subject: Please confirm your tour at WeLive today
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Tour_Outcome__c.Tour_With__c},
Looking forward to showing you around today at {!Tour_Outcome__c.Start_Time__c}! Please check in at the front desk of {!Tour_Outcome__c.Location_Address__c} and a team member will meet you in the lobby.
Should you be running behind schedule or unable to make your tour, please reply to this email and let me know, or give us a call at 888-977-4184.
Best, <LEAD OWNER FIRST NAME>
